#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=3. Discussion
#Text=This study showed that the cotreatment of G. lucidum extracts ( GLE ) and quercetin ( QCT ) exerted synergistic antitumor and antiviral activities against SNU719 EBVaGC cells .
#Text=Low concentrations of the cotreatment resulted in both the synergistic activation of cytotoxicity in SNU719 cells and the suppression of tumor development in MKN1-EBV xenograft mice .
#Text=The addition of a low concentration GLE to QCT reinforced QCT-mediated cytotoxicity and QCT-mediated apoptosis in SNU719 cells .
#Text=Furthermore , the addition also activated the EBV lytic gene promoter and upregulated EBV genes .
#Text=Interestingly , ganoderic acid A ( GAA ) , an effective molecule of GLE also showed similar bioactive features with QCT like GLE .
#Text=The low concentrations of the GAA and QCT cotreatment reinforced QCT-mediated cytotoxicity and QCT-mediated apoptosis in SNU719 cells .
#Text=Furthermore , the cotreatment activated the EBV lytic gene promoter and upregulated EBV genes , like GLE .
#Text=QCT has been shown to exhibit potential anticancer properties owing to its antiproliferative , growth factor suppressive and antioxidant effects .
#Text=In addition , QCT can induce apoptosis , where it has been shown to reduce the growth of tumors and inhibit the spread of malignant cells .
#Text=Moreover , it inhibited chemical carcinogen-induced cell transformation , which was evident as cell viability decreased , ROS generation and microRNA-21 elevation occurred in cancer cells .
#Text=Besides its antitumor effects , QCT has been shown to have antiviral activity through its anti-infective and anti-replicative abilities .
#Text=The replication of herpes viruses , including EBV , was found to be affected by QCT .
#Text=EBVaGC exhibits mixed characteristics of both gastric carcinoma and EBV .

#Text=Apoptosis and EBV lytic reactivation can control the fate of EBVaGC cells , where antitumor agents can induce apoptosis and antiviral agents can stimulate EBV lytic reactivation to further aggravate cell lysis .
#Text=QCT exhibits both antitumor and antiviral activities against EBVaGC .
#Text=This dual function of QCT is likely to be synergistic .
#Text=GLE , containing polysaccharides and triterpenes , is known to suppress the proliferation and metastatic potential of breast cancer cells by inhibiting Akt , AP-1 and NF-κB .
#Text=Moreover , GLE modulated the estrogen receptor signaling and inhibited oxidative stress-induced invasiveness of breast cancer cells .
#Text=Consistent with the results of previous studies on breast cancer , our study showed that GLE enhanced both QCT-mediated apoptosis and EBV-lytic reactivation .
#Text=The effects of GLE were evident at low concentrations of QCT .
#Text=Furthermore , QCT also enhanced the GLE-mediated upregulation of the EBV gene expression .
#Text=Similarly , the effects of QCT were evident at low concentrations of GLE .
#Text=Therefore , these results suggested that GLE enhanced QCT-mediated apoptosis , whereas QCT increased GLE-mediated EBV lytic reactivation .

#Text=Mycotherapy has several benefits , where it improves the overall response rate during cancer treatment , enhances immunity owing to the stimulation of T cell proliferation and reduces some chemotherapy-associated adverse events , such as nausea and insomnia .
#Text=Medicinal mushrooms have mainly been used in Asian countries for hundreds of years for the treatment of infectious diseases .
#Text=More recently , they have been used for cancer treatment as adjuncts .
#Text=Importantly , they have an extensive clinical history of safe use as single agents or in combination with chemotherapy .
#Text=GLE has been intensively combined with mycotherapy for the treatment of broad-spectrum cancers .
#Text=GLE has shown antitumor activities against breast cancer , bladder cancer , prostate cancer , colorectal cancer and others .
#Text=These tumor inhibitory effects of GLE were attributed to the disruption of the proliferation and metastasis of cancer cells .
#Text=However , the fact that EBV is the initiator of gastric carcinoma should be considered in the treatment of EBVaGC .
#Text=EBV should be eliminated to reduce the risk of EBVaGC relapse .
#Text=In this study , QCT strongly induced EBV lytic reactivation .
#Text=The synergistic effects of the GLE and QCT cotreatment might enhance QCT-mediated apoptosis and GLE-mediated EBV lytic reactivation .
#Text=Therefore , QCT-supplemented GLE might be used as a medicinal food with a dual function as an antitumor and antiviral agent for EBVaGC treatment .
#Text=To the author ’s knowledge , this is the first study to report that QCT-supplemented GLE might be effective in treating EBVaGC .
#Text=The synergistic antitumor and antiviral effects were supported by both in vivo and in vitro studies .
#Text=Hence , the combined use of GLE and QCT could be beneficial in cancer treatment by alleviating the toxicity of conventional chemotherapy and improving the immune function .
#Text=However , more studies are still needed to further elucidate the molecular mechanisms of the direct antitumor and antiviral effects of QCT-supplemented GLE .
